name: Space Blast (Nibirutta)
description:
My first game as a developer, feel free to comment about it.

Move keys - A, S, D, W

Normal Shot - Left mouse button

Special Shot - Right mouse button

Shield - E

To use the special shot, you'll need to get a power up.

Music & Sound Effects by Kevin MacLeod

Sprites by dininho, GusArt, Kenney and Ansimuz

Enjoy!
